title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Chain - Contemporary Haaram
materials: 55 pieces). Features the finest Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A delicately crafted gold chain interspersed with a floral motif center. Features two pear-shaped emeralds embraced by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The diamonds are meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance. This piece blends the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry with a modern, minimalist aesthetic.
occasions: and modern celebrations. A stunning gift for birthdays
description: Crafted with the highest quality 22k gold and natural gemstones, this chain offers enduring beauty and investment value. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings. The combination of emeralds and diamonds is considered auspicious in South Indian tradition. The subtle design allows for versatile styling with both traditional and contemporary outfits.
